TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sayie, title = Sayie, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sayie} }

S.FORM: Sayie Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Sayie a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 70 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat74%, Tayal16%, Amis1%, Paiwan4%.

Sayie Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Sayie a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 70 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat74%, Tayal16%, Amis1%, Paiwan4%.
